name: Holden the Hero 2: Temple of Elements
name_original: Holden the Hero 2: Temple of Elements
description: This is a project I created for my friend's son's birthday. It's the sequel to a game I made for a previous birthday. This took me a few hundred hours over three years .  I don't have formal game development experience  so if you do play it, I would greatly appreciate any feedback you have. I'd like to use video games to tell more stories so please do leave comments.
